an10.65:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sāriputto magadhesu viharati nālakagāmake.
an10.65:4.2: Atha kho sāmaṇḍakāni paribbājako yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
an10.65:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an10.65:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho sāmaṇḍakāni paribbājako āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
an10.65:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, sukhaṃ, kiṃ dukkhan”ti?
an10.65:5.3: Abhinibbattiyā, āvuso, sati idaṃ dukkhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
an10.65:5.4: sītaṃ uṇhaṃ jighacchā pipāsā uccāro passāvo aggisamphasso daṇḍasamphasso satthasamphasso ñātīpi mittāpi saṅgamma samāgamma rosenti.
an10.65:5.5: Abhinibbattiyā, āvuso, sati idaṃ dukkhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ.
an10.65:5.6: Anabhinibbattiyā, āvuso, sati idaṃ sukhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
an10.65:5.7: na sītaṃ na uṇhaṃ na jighacchā na pipāsā na uccāro na passāvo na aggisamphasso na daṇḍasamphasso na satthasamphasso ñātīpi mittāpi saṅgamma samāgamma na rosenti.
an10.65:5.8: Anabhinibbattiyā, āvuso, sati idaṃ sukhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhan”ti.
